PASS Summit – Deep Dive on Microsoft Data Platform, Seattle, Oct 31 – Nov 3

Previous post
Next post

 
 
Tags: Business Intelligence, Microsoft, PASS, Seattle, WA

Excellence in Microsoft Data Platform learning is what PASS Summit is all about. Join us Oct 31 - Nov 3, 2017 in Seattle.


     

The Business Intelligence Skills and Knowledge You Need.

Excellence in Microsoft Data Platform learning is what PASS Summit is all about.
Join us October 31 - November 3, 2017 in Seattle, WA

MEET THE SPEAKERS

Learn from like-minded Business Intelligence professionals
who share your passion for data and are experts within their field:

Paul Turley

A Microsoft Data Platform MVP who works with companies around the world to visualize and deliver critical information to make informed business decisions.
  learn more

Marco Russo

A Business Intelligence consultant and mentor. His specialty is anything related to data warehouse relational and multidimensional design. learn more

Ginger Grant

A Microsoft MVP who derives meaning from data through the different Microsoft BI stack tools, and more recently, through the application of advanced analytics with R and machine learning. learn more

Reza Rad

An author, trainer, speaker, and consultant. Reza has been a Microsoft Data Platform MVP for 7 years, specializing in Microsoft Business Intelligence and data. learn more

Why Go?

PASS Summit brings you over three days of inspiring, jam-packed educational opportunities
focused on the Microsoft Platform, professional connections, and new skills and know-how
you can put to use immediately.

Registration Packages & Pricing
